description: This Java source file defines the AttributeInfo class, which encapsulates information about attributes in a device cluster, including properties like id, type, and manufacturing ID, with JSON serialization support.

classes.name: AttributeInfo
classes.description: Represents attribute information with properties for id, type, and an optional manufacturing ID, with support for JSON serialization/deserialization.

methods.name: AttributeInfo
methods.description: Constructor initializing id, type, and optional manufacturing ID, annotated for JSON creation.

methods.name: getMfgId
methods.description: Returns the manufacturing ID, if present.
